headline: Assessing NRG Energy (NRG) Valuation After Strong Multi Year Returns And A Large DCF Implied Discount
summary: Event context and recent share performance NRG Energy (NRG) has recently drawn investor attention after a mixed stretch in its share price, with a small 1 day gain and modest rise over the past week, but declines over the month and past 3 months. Over a longer horizon, NRG Energy shows a 38.4% 1 year total return and very large 3 year and 5 year total return multiples, alongside reported annual revenue of US$29.8b and net income of US$1.4b.
